핵심 개념 요약(한 문장): 물리적 마찰 또는 사람 간의 갈등을 의미.
콜로케이션(뜻 포함): 1) There is friction between the teams. 2) Friction causes heat.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: friction 뜻? → 마찰, Q2: 비유적 의미? → 불화, Q3: collocation? → friction between

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The disclosure shocked the public. 2) Companies must provide full disclosure.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: disclosure 뜻? → 공개, Q2: 동사형? → disclose, Q3: collocation? → disclosure of

콜로케이션(뜻 포함): go through hardship, go through documents
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) She went through a tough time. 2) Let's go through the report.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: go through 의미? → 겪다, 검토하다, Q2: 전치사? → through, Q3: 유사어? → undergo

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) He is regarded as a genius. 2) This is regarded as a major issue.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: be regarded ___? → as, Q2: 의미? → ~로 여겨지다, Q3: 유사 표현? → be considered

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The data is relevant to our study. 2) Provide only relevant details.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: relevant 뜻? → 관련 있는, Q2: 반의어? → irrelevant, Q3: 전치사? → to

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) Your comment is irrelevant to the topic. 2) This data is irrelevant.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: irrelevant 반의어? → relevant, Q2: 전치사? → to, Q3: 의미? → 관련 없는

콜로케이션(뜻 포함): relevance to the topic, social relevance
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The relevance of the study is clear. 2) This fact has little relevance.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: relevance 뜻? → 관련성, Q2: 반의어? → irrelevance, Q3: 전치사? → to

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The rules are explicit. 2) She gave explicit directions.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: explicit 뜻? → 명확한, Q2: 반의어? → implicit, Q3: collocation? → explicit instruction

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) There is an implicit message in the text. 2) His silence was implicit approval.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: implicit 반의어? → explicit, Q2: 전치사? implicit ___ → in, Q3: 의미? → 암시적

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The rules explicitly forbid smoking. 2) She explicitly said no.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: explicitly 뜻? → 명확히, Q2: 반의어? → implicitly, Q3: related adjective? → explicit
